intro.text: Operator, welcome to Block Strike. Your objective: survive the test arena and gather data.

firstWave.text: Wave one: expect light drones. Test your aim. Headshots recommended.

bossIncoming.text: Boss signatures detected. Brace and conserve ammo between phases.

midRun.text: Telemetry clean. Enemy patterns increasing in complexity. Keep moving.

lateRun.text: You are deep in. Adversaries deploying elites. Prioritize targets and use cover.

lowHp.text: Critical health! Break line of sight and use cover or medkits.

firstMed.text: Medkit collected. Stay mobile and top up when safe.

ticker_gossip1.text: Newsflash: lab coffee machine may be sentient.

ticker_gossip2.text: Rumor: maintenance drones plan a union vote.

ticker_gossip3.text: Fun fact: drones still can't appreciate jazz.

ticker_gossip4.text: Alert: vending machines now accept emotional support coins.

ticker_gossip5.text: Insider: test drones spotted debating optimal pathfinding routes.

ticker_gossip6.text: Reminder: update reflex implants before prime-time waves.

ticker_gossip7.text: Breaking: scientists teach drones to high-five — results mixed.

ticker_gossip8.text: Bulletin: cafeteria introduces mystery-flavor nutrient bars.

ticker_gossip9.text: Whisper: someone replaced ammo crates with party poppers. Investigating...

ticker_gossip10.text: Report: arena floor requests a day off to recharge its tiles.

ticker_gossip11.text: Leak: AI curator secretly writes poetry during off cycles.

ticker_gossip12.text: FYI: vents rumored to host micro-society of dust bunnies.

ticker_gossip13.text: Memo: please stop naming your turrets; recycling gets awkward.

ticker_gossip14.text: Rumor: hidden achievement for complimenting a drone before disabling it.

ticker_gossip15.text: Alert: rogue trainee spotted speed-running safety briefings.

ticker_gossip16.text: Fun fact: reloading to the beat increases accuracy by 0%. Still fun.

boss_5_start.text: Broodmaker spawns incoming. Eliminate pods to thin the swarm.

boss_5_down.text: Broodmaker neutralized. Collect supplies and prepare for escalation.

boss_10_start.text: Sanitizer online. Expect area denial and beams. Keep lateral movement.

boss_10_down.text: Sanitizer down. Data uplink stable. New armory options unlocked.

boss_15_start.text: Captain drone detected. Coordinating assaults. Break the formation.

boss_15_down.text: Captain down. Their chain of command is fractured.

boss_20_start.text: Shard Avatar materializes. Watch for clones and shards.

boss_25_start.text: Broodmaker returns, reinforced. Spread the damage, clear eggs fast.

boss_25_down.text: Heavy Broodmaker down. You are becoming the problem.

boss_30_start.text: Hydraclone detected. Eliminate clones quickly to prevent overwhelming numbers.

boss_30_down.text: Hydraclone neutralized. The field quiets—for now.

boss_35_start.text: Strike Adjudicator enters. Expect precision strikes and punish windows—stay moving.

boss_35_down.text: Adjudicator down. You have exceeded projections.
